title: panic in handler for Rename
body:
> What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`)
1.36-251-g0b2b4243-tps-limitÎ²
> Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
Ubuntu 16.04
> Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
Google Drive
> The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
mount
> A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
[panic.txt](https://github.com/ncw/rclone/files/1150896/panic.txt)

2017/07/16 10:05:08 fuse: panic in handler for Rename [ID=0xba9 Node=0x19 Uid=1000 Gid=1000 Pid=20284] from "Brain.on.Fire.2016.1080p.WEB-DL.DD5.1.H264-FGT.mkv" to dirnode 0x3a "Brain.on.Fire.2016.1080p.WEB-DL.DD5.1.H264-FGT.mkv": assignment to entry in nil map

        /home/ncw/go/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/cmd/mount/dir.go:185 +0x36c
